Articles.Content:
True!

The user below me lives in the UK and is dreading the inevitable reign of the UKIP racists.

Nope, I'm in good ol' America.

The user below me is also from America.

Yes but I have been told I have a British accent.

The user below me dislikes Obama Care.

Meh. I think that it's a step in the right direction, but it was a lousy step in general.

The user below me knows what ObamaCare is.

True, it's Obama's attempt at an American NHS, but you didn't like it because he said "you can have it, but only if you pay through the nose for it".

The user below me is aware of the wreck that the UK is going to become when UKIP win these elections.

Nope. I've never been to england so it's not a concern for me.

The user below me has listened to metal at least once in his/her life.

Yeah, occasionally.

The user below me loves Disco(old, modern, any...).

Nope. Rammstein all the way

The user below me is european.

Sweden reporting in.

The user below me has never made an SSTO.

Negative. Though most are VTOL jet-assisted rockets rather than spaceplanes.

The user below me has never been outside Kerbin's SOI.

False. Member of K.J.S.

The user below me uses the steam version of the game.

How does everyone know everything about me??? O ____ O

The user below me has never robbed a bank.

False. When I was a boy I looted my brother's piggy bank to buy candy.

The user below me has been in a car accident.

Nope, and I hope to never have one.

The user below me would rather take a flashy energy weapon instead of conventional weaponry.

Nope. In fact, I might prefer a crushing weapon like a sledgehammer. More smashy, and less complicated.

The user below is a programmer.

false, i do not know any code although i Wan-to (ha Fredrick Pohl reference)

the user below me is not me from the future

True, I'm from 1995.

The user below me hasn't been to Eeloo.

False-ish. Making a close encounter but running out of fuel and being stuck in orbit counts...right?

The user below me played with BB guns and pellet rifles prior to the invention of paintball.

False, I played with air rifles, but not before 1981.

The user below me has fired live ammunition from a real rifle.

Yup! from an M16.

The user below me has left the Earth numerous times during his/her lifetime.

True - Halo is such an amazing game.

The user below me can speak a language from every continent.

true, i can speak every form of english from every continent

the user below me is left handed

False.

The user below me knows more than 12 decimals of pi.

Nope.

The user below me know why HAL 9000 tried to kill his crew members.

True. HAL 9000 was told to keep secrets from the crew of Discovery, which was in direct conflict with his programming. He went nuts, computer wise, and decided that the best way to keep a secret was to make sure the crew was dead, therefore he would never have to tell the secret.

The user below me has never seen 2001 and 2010 back to back.
